td.content: s:f aged 46 ys presents with 12 days history of moderate weight loss. patient also reports moderate vague pain in left upper quadrant, moderate loss of appetite. o:Height 65 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Ovarian Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cisplatin - 75 mg/m2 IV, and ordered pelvic US.

s:pt presents with moderate weight loss. pt also reports moderate vague pain in left upper quadrant, moderate loss of appetite. pt is a female software engineer aged 47 yrs. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in her past denies any smoking o:Height 66 in, Weight 208 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Ovarian Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cisplatin - 75 mg/m2 IV, and ordered pelvic US.
